front.title: Native IPv4 multicast in IPv6 Core using PIM

abstract.t: This document describes how PIM Sparse-Mode can be used to construct IPv4 multicast trees across an IPv6-only network core. It specifies the use of IPv6 PIM messages to carry IPv4 group and source addresses, the use of RPF vectors for reachability, and a new Hello Option to signal support for this capability.
